attributes.action: Force all organisations to accept provisional driving licences as a form of ID
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Some bars, banks and other organisations which people need to show a form of ID will refuse to accept a provisional driving licence as a form of ID. 

Driving licences regardless of if the holder has passed their test or not should be accepted anywhere. Both have security measures on them and important info such as DOB and a photo of the holder

Why should people need to pass their driving test in order to get their licence accepted in some places? People show ID to prove they are old enough to buy a drink, withdraw a certain amount of money etc - none of which doesn't involve driving!

reasons: Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
